title: Authorizes the sale of gift baskets containing alcoholic beverages packaged with New York grown agricultural products
summary: Authorizes the sale of gift baskets containing alcoholic beverages packaged with New York grown agricultural products.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2035

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 13, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. REILICH, KOLB, CALHOUN, THIELE -- Multi-Sponsored
         by  --  M.  of  A.    BARCLAY, BURLING, BUTLER, CONTE, CROUCH, DUPREY,
         FINCH, HAWLEY, P. LOPEZ, J. MILLER, MOLINARO,  OAKS,  RAIA,  SALADINO,
         SAYWARD, TEDISCO -- read once and referred to the Committee on Econom-
         ic Development, Job Creation, Commerce and Industry

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  alcoholic  beverage control law, in relation to
         authorizing the sale of gift baskets  containing  alcoholic  beverages
         packaged with New York grown agricultural products

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The alcoholic beverage control law is amended by  adding  a
    2  new section 76-g to read as follows:
    3    S  76-G.  SPECIAL LICENSE TO SELL WINE PACKAGED WITH NEW YORK AGRICUL-
    4  TURAL PRODUCTS. 1. ANY PERSON MAY APPLY TO THE LIQUOR  AUTHORITY  FOR  A
    5  SPECIAL  LICENSE TO SELL WINE WHICH IS PRODUCED IN NEW YORK AND WHICH IS
    6  PACKAGED WITH FOOD PRODUCTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE  PROVISIONS  OF  THIS
    7  SECTION.  SUCH  APPLICATION  SHALL  BE IN WRITING AND VERIFIED AND SHALL
    8  CONTAIN SUCH INFORMATION AS THE LIQUOR  AUTHORITY  SHALL  REQUIRE.  SUCH
    9  APPLICATION  SHALL  BE  ACCOMPANIED  BY  A CHECK OR DRAFT FOR THE AMOUNT
   10  REQUIRED BY THIS ARTICLE FOR SUCH LICENSE. IF THE LIQUOR AUTHORITY SHALL
   11  GRANT THE APPLICATION IT SHALL ISSUE A LICENSE IN SUCH FORM AS SHALL  BE
   12  DETERMINED BY ITS RULES.
   13    2. A LICENSE GRANTED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION SHALL PERMIT THE SALE OF
   14  WINE  PRODUCED  IN NEW YORK STATE AS PART OF A PACKAGE WHICH CONSISTS OF
   15  AT LEAST FIFTY PERCENT FARM OR FOOD  PRODUCTS  WHICH  HAVE  BEEN  GROWN,
   16  HARVESTED OR PRODUCED WHOLLY WITHIN NEW YORK STATE.
   17    3.  NO MORE THAN ONE LICENSE SHALL BE GRANTED TO ANY PERSON UNDER THIS
   18  SECTION.
   19    4. LICENSEES UNDER THIS SECTION SHALL BE PERMITTED  TO  SELL  WINE  SO
   20  PACKAGED FOR CONSUMPTION OFF PREMISES AS WELL AS TO SHIP WINE AS PART OF
   21  A  PACKAGE  TO  PERSONS WITHIN THIS STATE AND TO PERSONS OUTSIDE OF THIS

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03786-01-1

       A. 2035                             2

    1  STATE.   LICENSEES  SHALL  COMPLY  WITH  ALL  APPLICABLE  PROVISIONS  OF
    2  SECTIONS SEVENTY-NINE-C AND SEVENTY-NINE-D OF THIS ARTICLE.
    3    5. TRANSFERENCE OF A LICENSE UNDER THIS SECTION MAY BE MADE IN ACCORD-
    4  ANCE WITH PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND ADVANTAGE.
    5    S  2.    This  act  shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day
    6  after it shall have become a law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing the sale of gift baskets containing alcoholic beverages packaged with New York grown agricultural products
